features.featureName: Consolidated business information across all locations
features.flow: 1. The administrator logs into the system. 2. The system fetches data from all branches. 3. The administrator views consolidated reports. 4. The system updates data in real-time.
screens: Branch List Screen: Lists all branches with their current status

features.flow: 1. The administrator navigates to the branch management section. 2. The system displays a list of all branches. 3. The administrator can add, edit, or delete branch information. 4. The system updates the branch information accordingly.
screens: Branch Management Screen: Lists all branches and allows CRUD operations
Add Branch Screen: Form to input new branch details
Edit Branch Screen: Form to update existing branch details

features.flow: The system allows administrators to create and manage staff accounts for each branch. Local staff can log in to their accounts to access branch-specific information and perform tasks. Administrators can assign roles to staff members, controlling their access to different features. Staff members can view their schedules, manage orders, and access relevant branch information. The system also enables administrators to track staff performance and provide feedback.
screens: Staff Account Creation: A form for administrators to create new staff accounts, including assigning roles and branch affiliations.
Staff Dashboard: A personalized dashboard for staff members to view their schedules, access branch information, and perform tasks.
Staff Performance Tracking: A screen for administrators to monitor staff performance, including metrics on order management and customer service.
Staff Feedback: A feature for administrators to provide feedback to staff members on their performance.

features.flow: The system will analyze existing manual tasks across all branches, identify repetitive and time-consuming processes, and automate them. User roles involved include system administrators and branch staff. Step-by-step actions include: 1) System administrators configure automation rules based on business processes. 2) Branch staff perform tasks as usual. 3) The system automatically executes predefined tasks, such as data entry, report generation, and notification sending. 4) Branch staff verify the accuracy of automated tasks.
screens: Automation Rule Configuration: For system administrators to set up automation rules.
Task Verification Dashboard: For branch staff to review and verify automated tasks.
Automation Log: To track the history and status of automated tasks.
